Further inscription
"dees thien teeckeninghen principalen van / Johannes brueghel ofte franweedn breughel / costen tesamen fx guldens in comptant ghelt" ["these ten important drawings by Johannes Brueghel or Velvet Breughel cost together ten guilders in bare money"]
